explanation: CAPTCHA (Completely Automated Public Turing test) - distinguish human from bot.
Bot - automated software. Search engine bots, chatbots. Can be good or malicious.
Phishing relies on tricking users - fake emails, urgency. Social engineering.

answers: Mix of letters, numbers, symbols; length
explanation: Strong password: long, mix of character types, not dictionary word.

answers: Stores passwords securely - one master password
explanation: Password manager stores passwords. One strong master password. Reduces reuse.
OTP - valid for single use or short time. SMS, app. More secure.
Digital signature ensures document unchanged and sender verified.
CA issues SSL/TLS certificates. Trusted third party. Enables HTTPS.
SSL/TLS encrypt data in transit. TLS is newer. Used in HTTPS.

explanation: E2EE - data encrypted on sender device, decrypted only on recipient. WhatsApp uses.
192.168.x.x is private range. Used in home/office LANs. Not routable on internet.

explanation: IPv6 has huge address space. IPv4 has 4.3 billion; running out.
Ping sends packet to host, measures response time. Network diagnostic.
Traceroute (tracert on Windows) shows route packets take. Each hop listed.
Throttling - ISP or service limits speed. Can be for management or plans.

answers: All data treated equally - no discrimination
explanation: Net neutrality - ISPs treat all data same. No blocking, throttling, paid priority.
Video streaming consumes large bandwidth. Major share of internet traffic.

answers: Playing while downloading - no full download
explanation: Streaming - data played as received. Netflix, YouTube. No full file download.

answers: Data arrives slower than playback needs
explanation: Buffering - loading ahead. When speed insufficient, playback pauses.
Latency = delay. High latency in games = lag. Measured in ms.
100 Mbps = 100 megabit/sec. 1 byte = 8 bits. So ~12.5 MB/s max.

explanation: Home connections often asymmetric - download faster than upload.

Coaxial - copper with shield. Cable internet, TV. Still used.

explanation: Twisted pair - Ethernet cables. Twisting reduces crosstalk, interference.
